title: When Is It Time To Hit The Reset?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim Bontemps and Tim MacMahon to talk if the Blazers should tank this season and shut down Dame, how the Lakers should manage Russell Westbrook and an interesting betting moment from the Warriors game.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Should The Blazers Tank This Season? How Should The Lakers Manage Russ?
